text: The Israelites assigned these cities with their pasture lands to the Levites,
He made peace with the people of Beth-zur, and they evacuated the city, because they had no food there to enable them to withstand a siege, for that was a sabbath year in the land.
How then can one not understand that these are not gods, who save themselves neither from war nor from disaster?
But when they saw him walking on the sea, they thought it was a ghost and cried out.
But the one who listens and does not act is like a person who built a house on the ground without a foundation. When the river burst against it, it collapsed at once and was completely destroyed.‚Äù
Your ancestors ate the manna in the desert, but they died;
